description: This file defines the DashboardProvider class, which extends ChangeNotifier to manage and provide vehicle status data for a fleet management dashboard in a Flutter application.

classes.name: DashboardProvider
classes.description: A provider class managing vehicle data and status counts, notifying listeners when data updates.

methods.name: DashboardProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the data source.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches vehicle data from the data source and updates status counts accordingly, then notifies listeners.
